forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain. Mostly cloudy. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. West wind around 12 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. West wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As the afternoon unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, a moody ambiance envelops the city. The clouds hang heavy, offering a subtle reminder of the forecasted chance of rain. Temperatures are gentle, hovering around the 56-degree mark, while a cool west wind traverses the streets, carrying a hint of moisture. With a 30% chance of precipitation, there's an undeniable possibility of light rains to come, adding a touch of drama to the otherwise ordinary day.

The skyline, shrouded in velvety gray, takes on an almost ethereal quality, with the Golden Gate Bridge just barely visible through the mist. As evening approaches and the temperature dips toward a crisp 50, it's wise to don layers: a light waterproof jacket paired with a trusty sweater will prove prudent against the chill and the looming threat of rain. As the light fades, consider a leisurely stroll through one of the quieter parks or a stop at a cozy café, where warm drinks offer solace amid the encroaching dampness. Let the rhythm of the clouds guide your adventures this afternoon, savoring the classic San Francisco spirit that thrives even on the dreariest of days.
